code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import ListStocks from"../../components/Stock/ListStock";import AddStock from"../../components/Stock/AddStock";import SearchStock from"../../components/Stock/SearchStock";import"./stocks.scss";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Stocks=_ref=>{let{isMobile,locationList,username}=_ref;document.title="FridgeMan - Stocks";const[addVisible,setAddVisibility]=useState(false);const[searchVisible,setSearchVisibility]=useState(false);const[stocks,setStocks]=useState([]);const[name,setName]=useState("");const[location,setLocation]=useState("all-locations");const getStocks=async()=>{await fetch("/api/stocks").then(response=>{return response.json();}).then(data=>{setStocks(data);});};useEffect(()=>{getStocks();},[locationList]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stocks page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stock-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[username,"'s"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Stock List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setAddVisibility(true);},children:"Add Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setSearchVisibility(true);},children:"Search Item"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddStock,{locationList:locationList,getStocks:getStocks,setAddVisibility:setAddVisibility,addVisible:addVisible}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchStock,{name:name,location:location,setName:setName,setLocation:setLocation,locationList:locationList,setStocks:setStocks,setSearchVisibility:setSearchVisibility,searchVisible:searchVisible}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListStocks,{locationList:locationList,getStocks:getStocks,stocks:stocks,setStocks:setStocks,isMobile:isMobile})]})});};export default Stocks;
